Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Main building is ±13,505 SF warehouse/office building. Built in 1920 with triple load capacity wood floors, brick/stucco façade, 2 loading dock doors with lift and 1 drive-in door. Office area with 12'+ ceilings and restroom. LL has offices, storage, conveyor belt and restrooms. 3-phase electric service.

Service building is ±6,768 SF concrete block construction, built in 1962. Concrete slab floor, two (3) 12' high drive in doors and one (1) garage door, office area/waiting room and a larger office in the center of the building. Floor drains, restroom and fenced yard area.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: For Sale or Lease

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: LVIP Lot 29 240 Emery Street Bethlehem Concept Plan 4
LVIP Lot 29 240 Emery Street Bethlehem Concept Plan 5

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Located within 5 minutes of I-78, 240 Emery provides Lehigh Valley users with an ideal facility for research and development, bio-manufacturing, robotics manufacturing, and clean room production. 240 Emery is strategically located in the heart of Pennsylvania’s Lehigh Valley industrial market and is in close proximity to all Northeast major tech hubs. This 80,216 SF high-tech flex building offers access to several major universities and research institutions within the area.

- 11 Minutes from Route 22
- 15 Minutes from Route 212
- 8 Minutes from Route 412
- 5 Minutes from I-78
- 6 Minutes to I-378

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Welcome to 240 emery located at 240 Emery, Bethlehem, PA 18015. This Class A Flex, R&D Facility offers several expansion opportunities in the premiere Lehigh Valley location. The current 80,216 SF freestanding Class A high-tech flex building has excellent proximity to neighboring Fortune 500 tenants, offers immediate access to major routes and interstates, and is located within 50 miles of Western PA and Philadelphia's top universities.

Property is located in LVIP VII Tax Program - which offers a variety of tax incentives. Including the Keystone Innovation Zone. As well as a financing program through the LVIP VII economic corporation.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 80, 216 SF Class A Flex, R&D, Facility with Expansion Options

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Beautiful class “A” flex park is comprised of 30 acres divided into four 6-9 acre sites. This is a prime location for a business, with excellent access to I-83, I-81, I-283, and the PA Turnpike.

This 65,000 SF building offers up to 8,112 SF of flex space, located on a 6 acre lot within the park.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
ELMHURST INNOVATION CENTER 
• 160,000± SF campus consisting of two 80,000± SF buildings
• Combining creative, dynamic office and open flex space with modern high-bay suites
• Best-in-class warehouse and shop design with loading and clear heights designed for tech and R&D focused tenants
• Building design offers high-quality materials with the mixing of metals, wood and brick, a state of the art translucent wall, efficient space planning, riverfront views, and modern amenities
• Building 1 broke ground in March 2021. It is currently under construction and will deliver in April 2022.
